channel.title: Wise Nubcake's 100% working compiler ! every version of jdk , no changes needed
channel.description:
Eaii peeps
I've seen a lot of people here who need a good compiler. I got one working for every JDK version. Just have one with javac. :p that wont be hard. It's 100% creditted to me and if you put your own name on it your a silly bastard :)
[code]@echo off color 4 title Wise Nubcake's Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
It's a really easy compiler. It gives you the right to use every version of jdk.So just add in into your compiler
Rep me if its good and post if you gonna use it !

item.title: Wise Nubcake's 100% working compiler ! every version of jdk , no changes needed
item.dc:creator: @aaronvdw aaronvdw
item.description:
@aaronvdw wrote:

yes , it also appears the download section of java , cause if this code doesnt find your java , its broken

Read full topic

item.title: Wise Nubcake's 100% working compiler ! every version of jdk , no changes needed

item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

This is good, and if you still get java isn’t recognised, you need to uninstall java, then install it again.

Read full topic
